task_description: Fix ACE Python scripts to handle nested JSON
final_answer: Fixed 4 scripts (retrieve_bullets.py, detect_conflicts.py, merge_deltas.py, update_counters.py) to handle both flat lists and nested {bullets: [...], metadata: {...}} structures
observations: Bullet about using specialized tools was helpful in reminding me to check Python script patterns. However, no existing bullet covered the specific issue of handling multiple JSON schema formats robustly.
